div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2090 Pachino, extreme SE Sicily, 1960 Burial: c. 415 B.C. Contents: 100-200 AR Acragas: tetradr. (as Rizzo, MGS, pl. 1, 16, fdc) Catana: tetradr. (as R., pl. 11, 7-8; not 9-15) Gela: tetradr. (to Jenkins 476, fresh) Leontini: tetradr. (to R., pl. 24, 13, 15) Messana: tetradr. (as R, pl. 25, 10, 13-14; not pl. 26) Syracuse: tetradr. (many as Boehringer 722 but also Tudeer 24, 29) Disposition: dispersed Jenkins, Gela, pp. 159-60
